meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>yakuza</radical> hands you a <radical>spoon</radical>, <kanji>death</kanji> is coming for you. It's the death spoon, a sign that the yakuza is coming to cause your death.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Death</kanji> comes in the form of a <reading>shee</reading>p (し). The death sheep works for the yakuza, and kills anyone who has their spoon.
